product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight One-Piece Long Underwear Suit - Women's
long_description: Built for warmth in frigid cold, the women's Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight One-Piece long underwear suit eliminates cold spots that can happen when wearing a separate top and bottoms. Long underwear suit has a soft, stretchy feel with a smooth face that glides beneath layers. Open-grid brushed fleece interior warms your core, wicks moisture and rests smoothly against your skin. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors. Side-zip drop-bottom is easy to undo when nature calls. Details include a high, turtleneck-style collar, a long center-front zipper, thumb loops to keep sleeves in place.
